io.github.dave5080.figure

Interface IAbstractShape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Rectangle, RegularFigure

    public interface IAbstractShape
extends DataReader
    An IAbstractShape is the abstract form of any shape implementable All the shapes that extend this class are listed in the Shapes enum
